headline: Honeywell Just Got Double-Downgraded After Its Solstice Spinoff, But Analysts Think It Can Still Gain 30% from Here
summary: Bank of America double-downgraded Honeywell, but the stock still has ~30% upside potential to the consensus price target tracked by Barchart.

headline: Is There an Opportunity in Honeywell After Shares Fall 15.5% in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Honeywell International is a bargain or overpriced? You are not alone; investors everywhere are keeping a close eye on its current fair value. The stock has faced some rough waters lately, dropping 5.5% in the last week, down 7.5% over the past month, and currently sitting nearly 15.5% below where it started the year. This recent weakness comes as markets react to a string of developments, including shifts in industrial demand and updates from competitors in the capital goods...
